title: Dog Food Recall, linked to one death so far. | Renee | The River 105.9
text: Dog Food Recall, linked to one death so far. posted by Renee - share Evanger's is recalling a brand after it was exposed to,Pentobarbital, which can affect animals that ingest it, and possibly cause side effects such as drowsiness, dizziness, excitement, loss of balance, or nausea, or in extreme cases, possibly death . Many states are on this list, including Massachusetts. Please share with friends, it could save their beloved pets life. CLICK HERE FOR IMPORTANT LOT NUMBERS and details. HI! I have lived and worked in CT my whole life....I LOVE it here! I grew up listening to WHCN..and it's so cool to be a part of the team now!I knew in 8th grade at O'Brien School in East Hartford that I wanted to be a DJ! I also host 2 shows: Celebrity Access, where you'll get great interviews from all the stars & Community Access, a show that provides all kinds of lifestyle information, health tips, family events, public service announcements on and on, if it's going on in Connecitut we're on it! Contact
